value: Primarily expressing specific gratitude related to academic work, not a general update or request.
A specific event or period of support/guidance related to the student's academic project or progress.
Reinforcing the value placed on the professor's professional contribution and maintaining a positive working dynamic.
Focused on the professor's role, expertise, time, or specific actions within the academic context.
Professional and respectful, ensuring sincerity of gratitude while upholding formal boundaries.
